resourceTemplates.name: get-catalog-entry
resourceTemplates.title: Get update catalog entry
resourceTemplates.description: Gets the details of a specific update catalog entry by ID.

resourceTemplates.name: list-deployments
resourceTemplates.title: List deployments
resourceTemplates.description: Lists all deployments of updates in Windows Updates.

resourceTemplates.name: get-deployment
resourceTemplates.title: Get deployment details
resourceTemplates.description: Gets details about a particular deployment by ID.

resourceTemplates.name: get-applicable-content
resourceTemplates.title: Get applicable content for deployment audience
resourceTemplates.description: Gets update content applicable to a given deployment audience.
